title: Feature: Option so select multiple Connections at the Overview menue
author: Chrisu02
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
It would be awsome to have a multiple selection possibility like at windows with "shift" for Connection from - to, or Control to select multiple specific Connection
Then you only have to press right click to one of this connection, select the Task / external Program and it will be executed to any of the selected connection.

## Current Behavior
Currently you have to enter the Submenu of each Connecti...
